name: instead of
posTip: Word used before noun, pronoun or -ing form of verb to show place, direction, etc.

trans_examp.trans_en: in place of someone or something

example.eg: You can go instead of me, if you want.
example.egtrans: 如果你愿意，你可以代替我去。

example.eg: Instead of complaining, why don't we try to change things?
example.egtrans: 与其抱怨，不如我们来作改变？
